column5: Buddy Bill and I decide, last night, we should get out before 6 and lay a beating on some Lake O perch. We had to change plans. The north winds were pushing waves onto the pier so we opted to move furth in shore. Turned out to be a good plan B. Out of the wind, the sun is shining and the fish biting. We seemed to hit a wide variety of species again without any OOS  fish.     We both managed to find a decent take home meal. By 1pm. everything had shut down and we called it a day
Now that's a great day of fishing!  Nice pics and fish there...hope dinner tasted great!
Isn't fishing the greatest sport of all.... WTG Bruce on another awesome outing Thanks for sharing Jacques
Us 'Grumpy Old Men' are having the time of our lives.  By the way, fish dinner, breakfast, etc... at Ugli Acres is always great.  Just ask any of the victims of my cooking.
"Victims of my cooking" ..... A great description. I have a few of those too for sure, Bruce. Glad you boys had a good day.
Another good day out there for ya Bruce, like Jaques said...fishing is just the best!
